official_title: Improving Care Coordination for Adolescents and Young Adults With Cancer: Implementing a Bridge Between Needs and Services
inclusion_criteria:
* AYAs with cancer ages 18 through 39 currently undergoing cancer treatment at the North Carolina Cancer Hospital/ UNC Children's Hospital
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 39 Years
exclusion_criteria: * Patients who decline to participate in the study
